modules.description: Provides functions for establishing database connections via URI, executing parameterized queries, and retrieving results as typed tuples. Works with database drivers that implement a common API, handling various relational databases through a unified interface. Used to build database-agnostic applications that can switch backends without code changes.

Provides functions to establish connections to MariaDB databases using URIs with specific query parameters for socket paths and configuration groups. Works with connection strings and low-level database options exposed by the MariaDB C library. Enables direct access to advanced connection settings like UNIX domain sockets and custom config sections.
